feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for missing translations in the react application
  • v5.11.3 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10408

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.2...v5.11.3

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: issue when email body is empty by @paulwer in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10406
  • Improve Storecove Proxy error handling by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10414
  • Feature: nordigen bank_integration setup with end user agreement by @paulwer in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10410
  • v5.11.4 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10415

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.3...v5.11.4
